briefTitle: Effects of a Paleolithic Lifestyle Intervention in Breast Cancer Patients Undergoing Radiotherapy
officialTitle: Short-term Effects of a Paleolithic Lifestyle Intervention in Breast Cancer Patients Undergoing Radiotherapy: A Pilot and Feasibility Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Dropout rate in the Paleolithic lifestyle intervention group
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Body mass index \>18 kg/m\^2
* Karnofsky performance index \>60

Exclusion Criteria:

* Metallic body parts
* Unable to comprehend the intervention
